Text:
Just to let you known.
Doing research for SAS v 9.1.3 I come across this site:

http://www.ddlsite.com/sas+v9.1.3/crack-serial-keygen-torrent/free-warez-full-download-1.html

This is a pay site offering what seem to be SAS 9.1.3 with Crack and Keygen

App
Sas V9.1.3 With Crack + Keygen
Sas V9.1.3 Serial + Fast Direct Links
Sas V9.1.3 Full Download
Sas V9.1.3 Torrent Fast Links
Sas V9.1.3 Activation / License Codes

Anybody have access to that site.
Would like to known if one of these crack and keygen is working before I pay for this. One year full access is $23.88

Hello jacques.paul,

I'm fairly certain that network of sites is all BS..
I've done searches for really old and obscure software that I'd never expect to find online, and only those sites (pay $X for yearly menbership) seemed to have it --- of the entire web!!

Try a few more software searches at that site.  I have a feeling you'll find the same pattern for each software:
Software Name v#.# With Crack + Keygen
Software Name v#.# Serial + Fast Direct Links
Software Name v#.# Full Download
Software Name v#.# Torrent Fast Links
Software Name v#.# Activation / License Codes

It looks way too generic to me!  Besides, SAS HAS NO KEYGEN.  It is time licensed software with a "setinit" file.   And I've never seen a crack for SAS after version 9.0.

Let me know if you learn otherwise!

I found version 8.2 on a Chinese FTP and it works in perpetuity without expiration and has most products in the license.  Most other versions are already expired. :(
jacques, try doing a search for "this site is a scam that does nothing but clog up the internet with a bunch of crap" and tell me what your results are.

Try this one:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4006488/SAS_v9.0.0_with_licence

or this one:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5298726/SAS_v9_Portable

It's not the most recent version--but it works...
